segments.text: Here you are . Seventy-five cents , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And please send this letter by registered mail .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is there anything valuable in it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There's a check for two hundred dollars and a photograph .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Shall I make out a receipt ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That will be ninety-five cents in all .
segments.speaker: S2
